languages.text: « {mf|Un|Une} mon-keigh {mf|chargé|chargée} de porter les messages de la Tempête ravageuse ? Ridicule ! »
languages.original_text: "A mon-keigh serving as a messenger of the Reaving Tempest? Preposterous!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Un|Une} mon-keigh {mf|chargé|chargée} de porter les messages de la Tempête ravageuse ? Ridicule ! »
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: “区区一只猴子，竟敢谎称是狂风阴谋团的使者？何等荒谬！”
languages.original_text: "A mon-keigh serving as a messenger of the Reaving Tempest? Preposterous!"

traits.locale_text: “区区一只猴子，竟敢谎称是狂风阴谋团的使者？何等荒谬！”
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイがリーヴィング・テンペストの使者だと？馬鹿馬鹿しい！」
languages.original_text: "A mon-keigh serving as a messenger of the Reaving Tempest? Preposterous!"

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイがリーヴィング・テンペストの使者だと？馬鹿馬鹿しい！」
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: "{mf|Ein|Eine} Chem-Pan-Sey, {mf|der|die} dem plündernden Sturm als {mf|Bote|Botin} dient? Absonderliche Vorstellung!"
languages.original_text: "A mon-keigh serving as a messenger of the Reaving Tempest? Preposterous!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Ein|Eine} Chem-Pan-Sey, {mf|der|die} dem plündernden Sturm als {mf|Bote|Botin} dient? Absonderliche Vorstellung!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: «¿{mf|Un|Una} mon-keigh haciendo de {mf|mensajero|mensajera} para la Tempestad Asoladora? ¡Qué disparate!».
languages.original_text: "A mon-keigh serving as a messenger of the Reaving Tempest? Preposterous!"

traits.locale_text: «¿{mf|Un|Una} mon-keigh haciendo de {mf|mensajero|mensajera} para la Tempestad Asoladora? ¡Qué disparate!».
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF

languages.text: "Müfteris Kasırga'nın elçiliğini bir mon-keigh mi yapıyor? Olacak iş değil!"
languages.original_text: "A mon-keigh serving as a messenger of the Reaving Tempest? Preposterous!"

traits.locale_text: "Müfteris Kasırga'nın elçisi bir mon-keigh mi olmuş? Olacak iş değil!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderF
